des:
Saswell SmartHome offers the most comprehensive voice controlled smart home experience with Alexa. Control your Saswell martHome devices hands free. Just say it, Saswell SmartHome will obey.

 

Here's a step by step guide:

(1).Search the Alexa Skills directory for " Saswell SmartHome";

(2).Click Enable skill of " Saswell SmartHome", then input your account username, password on the linking page; 

(3).Talk to Echo“Alexa,discover devices.”. Wait till Echo says "Discover is completed";

(4).Now all setup is done. Try talk to Echo to control your devices.

 

Here are the voice commands Smart Life has:

 

Thermostat:

* set the bedroom to cool

* Set the bedroom to XXX degrees

* Decrease the bedroom by 1 degrees

* Increase the bedroom by 1 degrees

* Increase bedroom by 1 degrees

* Resume my bedroom schedule
